item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 4, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Scientists glue two proteins together, driving cancer cells to self-destruct (267 points | 71 comments)
2. An embarrassingly simple approach to recover unlearned knowledge for LLMs (96 points | 20 comments)
3. I've had a change of heart regarding employee metrics (167 points | 77 comments)
4. Project Sid: Many-agent simulations toward AI civilization (295 points | 91 comments)

23. The Submerged Nabataean Temple in Puteoli at Pozzuoli, Italy (41 points | 9 comments)

25. GJS: Node.js Like Runtime for Gnome (20 points | 3 comments)
26. Speed, scale and reliability: 25 years of Google datacenter networking evolution (268 points | 69 comments)
27. Show HN: Tinder, but to Decide What to Eat (148 points | 130 comments)
28. Top discoveries about ancient people from DNA in 2023 (53 points | 2 comments)
29. Programming NetBIOS on OS/2 (49 points | discuss)
30. Hermes 3 – Nous Research (12 points | discuss)
